item.description: MANAGEMENT TOOLS Istio on Kubernetes Engine: beta Get one-click Istio deployment on Kubernetes Engine â€“ or add Istio to an existing Kubernetes Engine cluster. item.title: GCP updates | December 17, 2018
item.description: SECURITY Cloud Security Command Center: beta Monitor your cloud resources and quickly mitigate threats to them from a single, centralized dashboard. Track your cloud asset inventory, scan storage systems for sensitive data, detect common web vulnerabilities, and review access rights to your critical resources. item.title: GCP updates | November 26, 2018
item.description: DATABASES Cloud Bigtable now available in all three London (europe-west2) zones: GA Cloud Bigtable is a massively scalable, fully managed NoSQL database service for large analytical and operational workloads. Product page DEVELOPER TOOLS Cloud Scheduler: beta Cloud Scheduler is a fully managed enterprise-grade cron job scheduler. You can schedule nearly any job, including batch and big data, as well as automate manual tasks, such as retries, all in one place.

item.title: GCP updates | November 12, 2018
item.description: COMPUTE Compute Engine â€“ logging serial port output to Stackdriver: beta This feature enables you to configure your VM instances to automatically log serial port output to Stackdriver, allowing it to persist beyond the lifetime of the VMs. Logging this data to Stackdriver makes it easier for you to analyze and troubleshoot VMs that have crashed or terminated. Documentation ãŠã‚‚ã—ã‚ã„ãªw IaaS

item.title: GCP updates | October 29, 2018
item.description: DATA ANALYTICS BigQuery now available in the London region: GA BigQuery is now generally available in the europe-west2 region. With regional availability, you can run large-scale workloads quickly in the same local Google Cloud regions you already use for storage, compute, and machine learning. Documentation | Blog DATABASES Cloud Spanner DML: GA Now you can use insert, update, and delete data manipulation language (DML) SQL statements in Cloud Spanner databases.

item.title: GCP updates | October 1, 2018
item.description: DATABASES New asia-south1 Cloud Bigtable region added: GA Cloud Bigtable is now available in the asia-south1 (Mumbai, India) region. Product page DATA ANALYTICS BigQuery â€“ Apache ORC ingestion: GA This feature adds support for importing ORC data from Cloud Storage into BigQuery. You can access it through Cloud Client Libraries in any of the seven supported languages. ORC is an open-source, column-oriented data format, widely used in the Apache Hadoop

item.title: GCP updates | September 17, 2018
item.description: ACCOUNT SERVICES Google Cloud Platform arrives in the Nordics with a new region in Finland The Finland GCP region, europe-north1, is the first Nordic cloud region from a major public cloud provider. Hosting applications in the new region can reduce latency by up to 65% for end users in the Nordics, and by up to 88% for end users in Eastern Europe, compared to hosting them in what was previously

item.title: GCP updates | September 4, 2018
item.description: COMPUTE NVIDIA Tesla P4 GPUs for Compute Engine: beta Compute Engine now offers NVIDIA Tesla P4 GPUs for 3D visualization, deep learning, video transcoding, and high-performance computing. NVIDIA Tesla P4 GPUs offer up to 5.5 teraflops of single-precision performance and 22 tera operations per second of INT8 performance.
